member.name: T:ScottPlot.Axis
member.summary: tools to work with data axes

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.Info
member.summary: display information about the axis, figure, pixel/unit mesh, etc.

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.Init(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: prepare the axis class for a certain size of data

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.CalculateMesh
member.summary: re-calculate pixel-to-unit and unit-to-pixel values from the given size and axis

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.Auto(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Given Xs and Ys, adjust the axis boundaries to fit the data (with optional padding)

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.PaddedLimit(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: Given an array, return [min, max] with optional fractional padding. This is intended to be used when calculating magins with Auto().

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.TickGen(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: return an array of good tick values for an axis given a range

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.RoundNumberNear(System.Double)
member.summary: given an arbitrary number, return the nearerest round number (i.e., 1000, 500, 100, 50, 10, 5, 1, .5, .1, .05, .01)

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.TickString(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: format a number for a tick label by limiting its precision

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Axis.PixelPoints(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: given Xs and Ys, use the axis information to return a list of points to be plotted.

member.name: T:ScottPlot.Draw
member.summary: Everything related to drawing on bitmaps. Data, axis, and figure labels. Fonts, pens, colors, and all that.

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Draw.Render
member.summary: combine the axis bitmap with the data bitmap

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Draw.Init(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: re-create the figure from scratch. re-create bitmap buffers (with new size). re-draw axis. clear data.

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Draw.InitAxis
member.summary: Draw a blank figure with an axis and labels. This stock figure will be reused (untlil a resize event), where the data graph will be pasted over this figure upon each render event.

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Draw.InitData
member.summary: create a clean-slate data bitmap

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Draw.Grid
member.summary: paint a grid on the data canvas

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Draw.ColorCode(System.String)
member.summary: given a string colorcode, reutrn that actual color

member.name: T:ScottPlot.Figure
member.summary: Create a Figure (everything starts here)

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new ScottPlot figure.

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.Resize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resize the ScottPlot Figure.

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.Render
member.summary: Return the rendered bitmap (axis + data)

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.SaveFig(System.String)
member.summary: write the current figure bitmap to a file

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.AxisAuto(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: given some data, automatically adjust the axis to accomodate all of it. manually set axis before drawing anything (very important).

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.PlotLine(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: add a line ((X,Y) pairs connected by lines) to the canvas

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.Grid
member.summary: draw a grid on the current data image

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.Clear
member.summary: erase all graph marks but leave axis intact

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Figure.Info
member.summary: show information about the current figure

member.name: T:ScottPlot.Generate
member.summary: Tools to create data (usually arrays of doubles) from nothing

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Generate.Sequence(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a sequence of evenly spaced numbers

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Generate.Salt(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: Add some salt (randomness) to an array.

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Generate.Random(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a sequence of random numbers (from 0 to "scale")

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Generate.Sine(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a sine wave

member.name: T:ScottPlot.Misc
member.summary: Miscellaneous standalone functions

member.name: M:ScottPlot.Misc.ArrayShow(System.Double[],System.Int32)
member.summary: write the start and finish of an array to the console
